node.name: Calendso
node.description: Calendso is the open source Calendly alternative. Self host it, or have it hosted by us. Integrate it seamlessly into your business with advanced customization and the open API. White-label by default, and designed to be a joy to use for you and your visitors.

node.name: Trove
node.tagline: Create highlights across the internet & send them to Notion
node.description: Trove is a chrome extension that allows you to create highlights and comments across the internet and send them to Notion â€” without ever leaving your browser. Try Trove now for free!

node.name: Piktostory
node.tagline: Get 12x more shares for your video
node.description: Want to boost engagement for your videos? Experience the power of document-like video editing with Piktostory. Turn your webinars, virtual events, Zoom or webcam recordings into customized, bite-size clips ready to drive social media results.

node.name: PowerTrade
node.tagline: Trade BTC & other crypto options on the go, now on iOS
node.description: PowerTrade makes it easy to trade crypto options on your phone so you can buy Calls or Puts on the go 24/7. Not available in the US.

node.name: Privacy Policy Template by Juro
node.tagline: Get a privacy policy people can actually read
node.description: With these design patterns by Juro and Stefania Passera, you can turn boring legal text into a transparent, engaging document that people can actually read.
